content: looking for a cute crochet amigurumi that works up fast check the no sew mini octopus pattern easy and fun crochet amigurumi octopus even beginners can make even better this pattern is no sew not even a single part to attach **** this is not a finished toy **** this pattern requires no sewing 100% no sew this pattern includes * step-by-step written instructions and photo tutorials for a mini crochet octopus materials * plush yarn tapestry needle safety eyes fyberfill for stuffing crochet hook * you can use any weight of yarn for this project difficulty advanced beginner skills required crocheting in spiral magic_ring chain slip_stitch single_crochet stitch increasing and decreasing if you have any questions contact us via private message
